feed.title: Category: Street Fighter 2010 | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Street Fighter 2010 (NES, 1990)
entry.content:
I played this game for maybe 10 rounds. Each time I could barely register a few hits on the target. It's an incredibly bizarre game. It's kind of a 2D platforming action game, but with an incredibly small arena and horrific controls. Definitely not a winner.

Total time: 0:08
